data.fullContent: Every year, people often attend a number of festivals, concerts, and performances. When attending those events, they might not think about how the appearance of the performers and stage setting have an impact on how they perceive the performance. For instance, the performers' clothing and the stage setting all have an important role to play in the expectations and experiences of the audience, as these reflect how the audience will interpret the artistic work that they will be experiencing. While stage settings can be technical as well as conceptual, especially when dealing with multimedia projects, the clothing worn by performers can be functional or symbolic. There are many reasons why fashion is used in music performance, one of which is to create emotions about the music. It can also be used for a form of artistic expression.
